QuestData.Title: The Great Banquet
QuestData.Description: The banquet should be starting any time now. Go find the High Elder and pay your respects. I'll be right behind you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with High Elder Cloudfall at the banquet grounds in the Tian Monastery.
QuestData.CompletionText: We will move on to the training soon enough, young $c. First, we must talk, and drink, and eat.$b$bThough I must say, I admire your discipline.
QuestData.RewardText: That concludes our introductions. You should be ready to begin your training.$b$bThat is... you should be ready to begin your training... AFTER we have one more mug of ale. Perhaps two. Shall we, $n?
